explains: v. 缩水，收缩；变小，缩小；萎缩；退缩；回避，离开（shrink 的现在分词）
wordGroup: shrinking violet 羞怯的人；畏首畏尾的人

sentences.en: Sony has also led the way in shrinking the size of compact-disc players.
sentences.cn: 索尼公司在缩小CD播放机尺寸方面也处于领先地位。

sentences.en: They have stagnant or shrinking markets for goods and services.
sentences.cn: 它们的商品和服务市场停滞不前或不断萎缩。

sentences.en: She swallowed one of the cakes, and was delighted to find that she began shrinking directly.
sentences.cn: 她吞了其中一块蛋糕，接着，高兴地发现自己马上开始缩小了。
